info.name: Flight Rising: Simple Layout (familiar icon fix!)
info.description:
Minimalist, clean and green FR layout.

Update: 2017-02 (fixed broken familiar icon)
info.additionalInfo:
Annoyed by the bleak grey a red FR design? This is for you!

A minimalist, clean and green FR layout.

Features:
- complete green and mostly borderless overhaul
- fully functional
- smaller top bar, username and treasure hidden in a tab that extends when hovering
- replaced familiar, gender and breeding icons


Update: 2016-09-07 (adjustments to the addition of the fourth lair row)
Update: 2016-08-15 (adjustments to FR's new nav sidebar)

Known issues: - If you use the Swipp+Balwdin highlighting style, the icons in the AH may become misaligned. It's just a minor nuisance and doesn't impair usage in any way. Will fix whenever I find out how.

Based on the (now gone?) 'Compact FR' style, fixed, edited and recolored.
